text: The 1680s BC was a decade lasting from January 1, 1689 BC to December 31, 1680 BC. ==Events and trends== * Egypt—Start of the Sixteenth Dynasty. * Egypt—Development of leavened bread (date approximate). ==Significant people== * 1686 BC—Death of Hammurabi (short chronology) * 1684 BC—Death of Érimón, Irish legend
title: 1680s BC
